page.title: 05Beermats
page.content: Children sometimes collect and play games with beermats. Beermats are pieces of card cut into different shapes and sizes.You find them in Public Houses where they are used for putting drinks on.They are decorated with words and pictures. Some children have quite a lot of mats.When they want to have a game they find a wall to play against.They lean two cards against the wall and then throw more beermats, trying to knock down one of the cards tilted against the wall. The winner is the first one to knock down a card.The winner keeps all the cards thrown during the game.
